sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Viscosity Sensor (ADS)
sensory_systems.description: A multi-parameter sensor capable of continuously monitoring dough viscosity, temperature, and protein content in real-time. Utilizes a combination of shear rate sensors, ultrasonic sensors for density estimation, and Raman spectroscopy for protein analysis.

technical_specifications.protein_detection_sensitivity: Detects protein concentrations down to 0.1% with 95% accuracy.

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: ± 0.1 Pa/s shear rate, ± 0.5°C temperature, ± 0.05% protein concentration

sensory_systems.name: Aroma & Taste Analysis System (ATAS)
sensory_systems.description: A miniaturized, hyperspectral sensor array coupled with AI-driven taste prediction models. Analyzes volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in the dough and final product to assess flavor profiles.

technical_specifications.sensor_type: Micro-Raman spectroscopy, gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) integration
technical_specifications.AI_model_accuracy: Predicts flavor profiles with 80% accuracy based on training data.

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Flavor prediction accuracy within ± 1 unit on a 1-5 flavor intensity scale.

sensory_systems.name: Visual Quality Assessment System (VQAS)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution 3D camera system combined with computer vision algorithms to assess crust color, texture, and loaf shape in real-time.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Crust color variations within ± 0.2 units on a 1-10 scale.

control_systems.name: Adaptive Mixing Control (AMC)
control_systems.description: A closed-loop control system that dynamically adjusts mixing speed, ingredient addition rates, and dough temperature based on sensor data from the ADS.

control_systems.name: Automated Proofing & Baking Controller (APBC)
control_systems.description: Precise temperature and humidity control system for proofing and baking stages, utilizing predictive modeling based on dough composition and environmental factors.

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Robotic Arm System (MRAS)
mechanical_systems.description: A flexible robotic arm system designed for ingredient handling, dough shaping, and loaf transfer, featuring integrated force sensors and tactile feedback.

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Dough Shaping System (ADSS)
mechanical_systems.description: Utilizes pneumatic actuators and robotic manipulation to precisely shape dough into various loaf sizes and forms.

software_integration.name: Dough Formulation & Optimization Engine (DFOE)
software_integration.description: AI-powered software that analyzes historical data, ingredient properties, and consumer preferences to automatically generate optimal dough formulations.

software_integration.name: Real-time Process Monitoring & Control System (RPMC)
software_integration.description: A central control system that integrates data from all sensors, actuators, and software modules, providing a real-time view of the entire breadmaking process.

key_research_areas: Digital Twin Technology for Breadmaking Process Simulation
